H0.text: The substance gets larger is something that must occur when a substance goes through a chemical change.

H1.text: The substance changing phases must occur when a substance goes through a chemical change.

H2.text: The substance changes shape when it undergoes a chemical change.

H3.text: The substance forms a new substance when it undergoes a chemical change.

A4.text: Chemical reactions are usually characterized by a chemical change, and they yield one or more products, which usually have properties different from the reactants.
